title: Linehan's Ordeal
description: Sean Linehan brings over his dead boss to Hong Kong to open Asiaâ€™s finest sports venue. Captivated by the alluring Hypatia, Sean gets kidnapped by Maoist guerrillas. His government will not pay a ransom. Can he stay alive long enough to fulfil his quest to become good? Dark humour and subtle satire enrich this tale of our all-too-near future.
author: Bryan  Murphy
